website_summaries.verdict: Royal Purple earns a lot of praise for providing results for many motorists, but it also has features that make it impractical for some.
pros: Known for delivering results – produces noticeable gas mileage improvement and less knocking in most automobiles
A reliable stabilizing additive for consumers who use low-octane fuel
cons: The bottle doesn't have a long spout, which makes it awkward to put into the tank without spilling
Contains MMT, which may "gunk up" some spark plugs

customer_reviews.title: The best fuel system cleaner I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: The best fuel system cleaner I have ever used. I made the mistake of letting my 2000 ford ranger sit too and basically my gasoline lost its punch. My vehicle was driving terrible. I researched and found this was the highest rated product out there. I poured it into my tank and let it sit over night. It was an immediate difference in performance. I should have done it as PM a long time ago.
customer_reviews.author: Pluto2727

customer_reviews.title: My vehicle genuinely needs an octane boost, and this works the best
customer_reviews.text: I have a 1965 Triumph with a milled cylinder head, and a street/race cam. These modifications were performed around 1970 by the first owner. (the engine has not been rebuilt since). I have had problems with pinging, light load uphill. This is the only product that works. One can usually can last me a year and half, since I don't drive the car all the time. I have had no additional issues with this classic since using this product. (misfires, smoke from bad rings, etc). I do not feel any additional MPG, or performance using this product. If you genuinely do not get enough octane from pump gas, I suggest trying this.
customer_reviews.author: Gladlands

customer_reviews.title: Definitely better gas mileage in my c5 Corvette
customer_reviews.text: Definitely better gas mileage in my c5 Corvette. It also smoothes out the idle and I get a better throttle response. I have terrible cold starts unless I use this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Zachariah McElhatton

customer_reviews.title: Boo, did night for my beautiful Vette
customer_reviews.text: Hello, I have to admit the packaging, labeling etc is what drew me in initially. After that it was the 30 point boost claimed. I bought a can to put in my Vette, in great anticipation and hope; yet the product dropped my mileage by 10 vice raising it by 30. If especially hard when you aren't at all sure of WHAT is going to manifest itself; at 13 a can will.... I have a '13 Grand Sport which is already fast, so any data point in speed or power did nit show itself......boo
customer_reviews.author: Tango Kilo

customer_reviews.title: Great fuel additive when running a tuner or larger cam.
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended for all the gear heads out there. You will absolutely notice a hp increase with no knocking or pinging, especially if using a tuner.

customer_reviews.title: Only fuel additive I use
customer_reviews.text: The best stuff for your car, I usually put this in at every fill up or two, keeps my Dodge Charger 6.1L going fast and strong.

customer_reviews.title: Worked for me!
customer_reviews.text: Took a long road trip. Put a can in my 2012 Cadillac CTS for better performance. I was impressed. In just the first 200 miles, I could feel a better and more powerful response. After filling up the tank for the trip home, I got another 3 MPG. That’s awesome in my book for a 3.5 V6!

Only regular (87 octane) fuel is available this summer locally without ethanol (my preference based on feedback from other owners). I've been using Max-Boost to compensate and the boat is running well.

customer_reviews.title: Royal Effectiveness!
customer_reviews.text: It's effective as long as I don't pour the entire bottle per each tankful. That has been my mistake all along. My car is tuned so when it seems to apply more timing advance is when I use only 1/4 of its content per half tank of gas or 1/2 of the booster per tankful. This is good for me to know because I don't end up wasting it right away.
customer_reviews.author: I4Y

customer_reviews.title: price is for one can not a 6 pack
customer_reviews.text: When I purchased the item the ad said 16 oz. 6 pack. it also said the package weighed 6.3 lbs. 16 oz. equals one pound consequently I thought it was a 6 pack as advertised. In actuality it is one can. The ad has since been edited deleting 6 pack but it still says it weighs 6.3 lbs. Just be aware of the quantity you are actually buying.
customer_reviews.author: DL

customer_reviews.title: I think I got better results from the NoS octane booster
customer_reviews.text: I think I got better results from the NoS octane booster. Also one thing I'd like to say is that this product doesn't come with a funnel, so it's kinda hard to get it in the gas tank unless you have a funnel for it. I wouldn't buy this again, Royal Purple should really include a funnel with this product.
customer_reviews.author: Alan

customer_reviews.title: Great product, as i have used different fuel octane ...

customer_reviews.title: 2007 Audi S8
customer_reviews.text: Good stuff my 2007 S8 V10 runs great on it. I would advise to mix it with Shell V-power. Plus remeber higher octain gas doesn't need same amount of energy to combust. Which translates to longer running engine.

customer_reviews.title: Learning view on a turbo ej25 motor says it allowed ...
customer_reviews.text: Learning view on a turbo ej25 motor says it allowed more timing with stock maps. Cant get anything but 91 in the Rockies so I use a few oz in every tank for my 6g72tt motor.

customer_reviews.title: Car runs much better with this in the tank
customer_reviews.text: Used in Porsche 996 Turbo. Car has a GIAC ECU upgrade optimized for 93 octane. I recently move to the west coast where it is unavailable. Car runs much better with this in the tank.
customer_reviews.author: Gary R

customer_reviews.title: Makes a big difference
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical about the these types of products and decided to try it on my 1999.5 Audi A4 1.8 Quattro. The turbo engine always has had a hard time with Texas heat and humidity. When I had the opportunity to drive the car at Circuit of the Americas I put this in the tank before filling up. It makes a big difference. Normally the car feels sluggish due to heat soak at temps above 95F and it feels as if the turbo is broken. With this product the car drives as if the temp is in the 70s with very good throttle response and no more sluggish feeling. Will keep on using this in the summer time.
customer_reviews.author: slimpie

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Decent product, i noticed no difference in performance with my Turbocharged car though.

customer_reviews.title: royal purple made the biggest difference and work perfect for my application
customer_reviews.text: Well it's royal purple. I recently put a different tune in my 04 Dakota 4.7 and with the need for higher octane than I can get at the pump I tried a few different octane boosters and out of all of them, royal purple made the biggest difference and work perfect for my application. I should have just tried rp first because I use royal purple produst in every part of my truck.
customer_reviews.author: Justin DeVincentz

customer_reviews.title: Great with their max-clean fuel system cleaner!
customer_reviews.text: This in conjunction with Royal Purple's Max-Clean Fuel System Cleaner made my 2004 Subaru WRX feel much smoother. I just got the car at 140,000 miles and it was feeling a little clunky. So I emptied the tank, put both liquids in, filled my tank up with premium, and drove off into the sunset.

customer_reviews.title: Royal Purple Max-Boost is the real deal!
customer_reviews.text: I run a supercharged L67 in my Bonneville SSEi and knock/detonation is deadly. This stuff is seriously worth several horsepower as proven in dyno test after dyno test and gives about a 3 point octane boost. I've always been skeptical about most cheesy boosters but this is the real deal. Check it out for yourself on this dyno test.

customer_reviews.title: Lead ingredient may foul o2 sensors.

customer_reviews.title: Max-boost works great. I had about a 1
customer_reviews.text: Max-boost works great. I had about a 1.5 miles per gallon increase in mt Ford F150. I will be using this product again. I also considering using it on my company's fleet of trucks.

customer_reviews.title: Power feels better at midband
customer_reviews.text: This went into my 2002 SPI Ford Focus and the idle became smoother with less hiccups. Power feels better at midband, and maybe a few hp improvement. Online videos show this product does remove some deposits from combustion chamber. It gave me the result I was expecting. I am happy to recommend the product from my own experience.

customer_reviews.text: I put this into a nearly bone dry 13 gal tank then filled tank with premium 91octane here in California. I drive a 2011 Subaru STI and honestly made no difference in fuel economy or power. Maybe two bottles may have made a difference but not worth the $ to try it.

customer_reviews.title: Royal Purple Max Boost
customer_reviews.text: Tried it . Its ok. No lead. Try Octane Supreme. It has real Tetraethyl lead for valves and seats. And will greatly increase octane.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for adding points for those who cant run anythimg lower than premium pump gas!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product! Noticeable difference! I have to run at least mid grade in my Pontiac grand prix gtp supercharged model, or it will spark knock due to the pulley size drop. So, this product, along with a full tank of mid grade pump gas, and I'm getting results as if I run 104 VP racing fuels! At half the cost Pr gallon! I'm game!

customer_reviews.title: See the change
customer_reviews.text: Poured a little of this in our golf cart and the rest in my wifes car.

product_meta.title: Royal Purple ROY11757 MAX BOOST, 16 fl oz
product_meta.description: Item Package Quantity:1Royal Purple Max-Boost - 16 fl oz Can is a high-performance octane booster with fuel treatment that increases gasoline octane, reduces emissions, and enhances engine performance while stabilizing fuel. Max-Boost is formulated with MMT, which delivers the best octane enhancement to help eliminate engine-damaging detonation, pre-ignition, and pinging or knocking from low octane gasoline. Max-Boost is formulated for engines equipped with carburetors, port fuel injection and direct injection, as well as turbocharged, supercharged and nitrous-injected engines. Safe for use in leaded and unleaded gasoline's, and alternate fuels like gasohol, reformulated gasoline, and all ethanol blends. Max-Boost is safe for oxygen sensors and catalytic converters. Performance engine oils contain higher levels of phosphorus as an anti-wear additive, which can accumulate in catalytic converters and reduce their effectiveness. Max-Boost protects against phosphorus poisoning of catalytic converters.
feature_bullets: Replaces lead additives for protection of non-hardened valve seats
Raises octane rating up to 30 points or 3 numbers
Restores power and fuel economy while cleaning deposits from fuel injectors
Reduces power loss due to knock-retard in computer-controlled vehicles
Reduces engine knocking/pinging and stabilizes fuel
Max-Boost is a racing formula and is not street legal.

specifications.Cover Included: Auto part, Automotive Accessories, Replacement and Performance parts
